shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the video publishing state changes.

p.codeblock: public void onVideoPublishStateChanged(Constants.VideoSourceType source, String channel, int oldState, int newState, int elapseSinceLastState) {}
onVideoPublishStateChanged?(channel: string, oldState: StreamPublishState, newState: StreamPublishState, elapseSinceLastState: number): void;

final void Function( String channel, StreamPublishState oldState, StreamPublishState newState, int elapseSinceLastState)? onVideoPublishStateChanged;

plentry.pd: The time elapsed (ms) from the previous state to the current state.
